nodes.text: Raquid Krev was a cargo hauler who owned and operated the freighter Lexus Primal during the early years of the New Republic. Krev once had a cargo of spice stolen by a group of spice-jackers. One of their members disguised himself as Raquid through the use of a Holographic Projector Doubler Suit, and overrode the programming of Krev's security droid, D-Mot.
